thread.title: Denese

author: Denese
title: Denese
text: I was very impressed how fast my dress came and not only that it came fast the dress fits beautifully and looks just like the one online. I point that out because am always afraid of buy things online thinking I will regret it. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is the online chat wasn't good and customer services seems short patience when I called about changing the size of the dress within five minutes of purchase it should pose a problem how many people own a tape measure in thier home well I don't. but overall great job I would buy again and reffer people.
